name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
damageResistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
languages: Terran, one language of its creatorâ€™s choice
description: Elemental myrmidons are Elementals conjured and bound by magic into ritually created suits of plate armor. In this form, they possess no recollection of their former existence as free Elementals. They exist only to follow the commands of their creators.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The myrmidon makes two Maul attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Thunderous Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The myrmidon makes one Maul attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 22 (4d10) thunder damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone .
